Articles.Content: Welcome to Mission Report. Here you can tell others mission you’ve done or you plan to do. You can be professional and draw a logo and make some discripson. Maybe even add photos. Just share your missions! And the public will like it.

I can only assume that you didn’t see the entire section of the forums called ‘Mission Reports’? There are reports in there ranging from single missions and incidents to entire career games spanning over a hundred game years and a few that turned into proper stories in their own right or which are being done like a real space agency would, with logos and twitter-style updates.

4 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

I can only assume that you didn’t see the entire section of the forums called ‘Mission Reports’? There are reports in there ranging from single missions and incidents to entire career games spanning over a hundred game years and a few that turned into proper stories in their own right or which are being done like a real space agency would, with logos and twitter-style updates.

Oh. I didn’t see that.
